response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features and benefits that are tailored to enhance your experience. Given its quality and capabilities, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12,000. Considering its immense value, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $15,000.
